statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} 2 \\ -4 \\ 1 \\ -3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -4 \\ 3 \\ -3 \\ 3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 16 \\ -22 \\ 10 \\ -18 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 20 \\ -30 \\ 12 \\ -24 \end{array}\right]\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
